{{Infobox dungeon |name = Slowpoke Well |image = [[File:Slowpoke Well.png]] |caption = A map of Slowpoke Well. |tokens = 3,500 |location = In Azalea Town, which is in the south of the map. }} '''Slowpoke Well''' is a dungeon in [[Johto]].
==Details==
===Dungeon Stats===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Normal || 67,900 |- | Boss || 280,000 |}
===Pokémon===
* Zubat * Slowpoke * Slowbro (boss)
